title: Can't connect to game on MacBook Air
body: About every 1 out of 4 games I am guaranteed not to connect into a game. I know I am connected to the internet because I can still watch youtube and well post here obviously. I've re-installed the game multiples times and used the repair option on the client and it doesn't fix anything. It's been happening for a while now and there has been no resolution.

replies.body: Do you see a network connection error when this happens or are you seeing something else?
It says I'm having a network connection. I am at college now and I will be playing with friends who are using the same wifi as me and they never have this problem.

There may be some issues with the local network configurations on your computer or it may be a problem with the network adapter in your PC as well. The first step I recommend taking is working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

If you encounter further issues, just let me know.
I've gone through all these steps and I still have the same problem. It's really annoying since now every time it happens I get 20 minute queues because it forces me to leave the game.

Since you're still having issues, I recommend running some system logs with our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attaching those logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) request.

If you have any issues with those steps, let me know.
